text:
Burger and fries were not hot when arrived.

But my God, the taste is incredible. Beef was medium rare and cooked to perfection. Fries were amazing. I wish I got them hot.

I will definitely order again

Should have read the reviews before orderingâ€¦. Burger is not bad and the buns are pillowy soft. The problem is with the cheese used. Why would the restaurant choose to use cheap-tasting cheese sauce for their burgers? With the aioli sauce the burger tasted way too creamy and jelat.

Just ordered this for a late dinner with my wife.

I had the cheeseburger, missus the non-meat schnitzel, and we shared a bacon and cheese fries.

The burgers were really good - cheeseburger is likely the best i had for takeout man. Wife thought the schnitzel tasted like chicken. Buns were fluffy and toasted also. And the fries were amazing - still crispy when delivered!

So 5 stars to show some love.ðŸ¤—

I ordered from here and the first time, the food was incredible. I re-ordered with some guests via Grab raving about their Harvest Burger, and how it was realistic. After three bites, I was advised it tasted realistic because it was real chicken and not vegetarian! I contacted Grab who advised me that the kitchen was actually aware prior to delivery that the food was incorrect, but failed to advise us. I have attempted to contact them numerous times, and have been promised follow up, but this has never happened. Obviously a company that does not care about its clientele, but more importantly is negligent and careless with no remorse.
Sorry but the bacon in your burger and cheese fries really cannot make it. Cheeseburger didnt even have a slice of cheese, just some nacho cheese sauce
